Reviews for Burger King Write a review 1 review First reviewed by OhEnry
0 helpful votes over 1 review OhEnry 1 Restaurant Review 0
Add as friend Send Msg Burger King OhEnry July 18, 2010 1.0 1.0 star rating 0 0 0 0 Votes Just drive by...don't even stop
If you took a fast food restaurant and hired a bunch of untrained chimps, you would end up with this poor excuse for a Burger King. I’ve gotten screwed here a few times but today was the last straw.
I asked for a Whopper with NO CHEESE . Pretty simple request and it’s not dinner rush so this should be easy. The untrained chimp repeats back, whopper NO cheese, little order confirmation sign says whopper NO cheese–guess what I got when I arrived home? What seemed like a week old whopper WITH cheese and the bag reeked of that smell when you put something metallic in the microwave.
Untrained, LAZY chimp grabbed whatever was nearest, tossed the bag into the microwave and tried to cover it up. Just avoid this place like the plague.
Dishes I tried:
WHOPPER®
1.0 star rating
tossed into the garbage and rummaged through the refrigerator Link To Review
